Text: Are you going to do the new Downton Abbey series that starts tonite?

You know how I never did a single episode of DA. And now, when I announced how I will encode just few shows, widen the "scope" surely is out of the question. I am sorry, but even if it is my own decision indeed - it is merely an aftermath, a consequence...

Cool, I just didn't want to waste my time on a lesser encode if you're going to do it.

Cheers!
